creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: Censor: Kiwame 極; publisher's seal: Eijudō mark (outside); Hayashi seal; in fan seal by Fujiokaya Hikojiro
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper

title: Parrot on a Flowering Plum
